text: Hi do you want to donate some of your .30 reward to Save the Children?
i could but i need more information about this charity organization.
Save the Children is a children's charity. You could actually donate up to 2$ that the research team will collect from us.
seems good, do they actually help children? i am a little skeptic
Well they certainly do have sad commercials with children in them
but do they help them? i want to know if i donate my money would go to a child and not to somebody pocked
I guess we could google it. I remember Penelope Cruz was in one of their commercials holding a baby if that means anything
if she was in a commercial this must be a legitimate charity, i heard that they are helping Hawaii now with food and other things.
I've heard of them from way back when I was a kid myself.
you will donate in todays charity? or i just have to donate?
I would donate the hypothetical money. I'm supposed to also ask you to choose an amount I will match whatever you choose.
how much are you donating and i will try to come up with the same amount ?
1$ from the 2$ they mentioned?
ok for sure but i dont like to be like an idiot, so please dont lie to me. Do you ever give a charity to another organization?
I donate to this Ocean charity. To save the Gulf Coast. i swear I will donate here if you do.
ok i will donate $1 today. i have donated to a cancer research group.
Okay cool. I wonder when they will move us on from this screen.
we have to make 10 conversation each so we have to talk for 2 more rounds.
You have been paying good attention lol. Okay no worries lets keep conversing
when you told me i counted because i usually see when the end conversation button hit.
Bye nice to have met you.
